title: Olympic Medals Dashboard
summary: Interactive Tableau suite focused on USA and global trends with gender-based analysis. Nine views cover participation, medal trends, top countries, and sport-level comparisons with filterable year/sport/country controls.
process: Views included: Breaking Barriers (growth in women’s participation & medals); Closing the Gap (male vs. female trends); Icons of Success (standout women Olympians); Global Spotlight (countries leading women’s medals); USA Perspective (success by gender & sport); Top 10 Countries (medal leaders); USA Medal Trends (gold/silver/bronze over time); Participation Over the Years (male vs. female); Key Sports Driving USA Dominance (gender-based comparison)
impact: Enabled historical trend analysis across sports, years, and gender
Highlighted countries and sports driving growth in women’s medals
Provided quick USA-focused comparisons by sport and medal type
